title: An Integrative Approach to Healthcare
description: NaturoMedica merges conventional healthcare with evidence-based natural medicine and offers complementary services including IV therapy and acupuncture.
cleaned_text: About Us Customized Solutions for Optimal Health NaturoMedica is located in Issaquah and serves Seattle and the greater Eastside communities of Bellevue, Mercer Island, Sammamish and beyond. At NaturoMedica we merge evidence-based natural medicine, conventional healthcare and state-of-the-art technology. NaturoMedica is a premier center of integrative medicine, offering naturopathic healthcare, acupuncture, IV therapy and other complementary services. Doctors at NaturoMedica can provide primary care or work alongside your established physician to address specific health concerns.
